column6: "DYSFUNCTION" PART 1 (OF 3) At an all-time low, the Fantastic Four are confronted by a cracked-mirror version of their own team -- one that may scuttle any chance the FF ever has of redeeming its reputation!
column8: | penciller (cover):Gene Ha | penciller:Paco Medina | colorist:Paul Mounts | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Mark Waid
